remediation: Upgrade llama-cpp-python to version 0.2.12 or higher.
title: Arbitrary Code Execution

vulnDescription.Overview: llama-cpp-python is a Python bindings for the llama.cpp library Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Arbitrary Code Execution due to improper Llama._create_completion suffix parameter check, allows an attacker to send string-like object which could actually lead to exploitation of this vulnerability.
